rows.label: tev001395_MSG0001
rows.name: A fine evening to you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0002
rows.name: Rock and I were just enjoying a bit of stargazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0003
rows.name: The night sky of Mira really is quite beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001395_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask where Celica's home planet is located.

rows.label: tev001395_JNK0020
rows.name: Lament

rows.label: tev001395_SEL0021
rows.name:
Express disappointment that Earth
is not among these beautiful stars.

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0004
rows.name: My home planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0005
rows.name:
I have seen pictures of Earth, so I know that my planet
bears a slight resemblance to yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0006
rows.name: But I have no idea where it is in relation to here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0007
rows.name:
It could be circling any of the stars above.
Or perhaps it is too far away to be seen at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0009
rows.name: Forgive me. I know what Samaar did to your home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I've seen pictures of the night sky over Earth.
It was very beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0011
rows.name:
It didn't seem to have the large stars we see here on
Mira, but there were so many small twinkling ones.
The night sky on my homeworld was like that at well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0013
rows.name: If you could return to Earth, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_JNK0030
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: tev001395_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod your head slowly.

rows.label: tev001395_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: tev001395_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you feel no particular urge to return.

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0014
rows.name: Of course you would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0015
rows.name:
I guess one can never truly abandon their home,
no matter what tragedy has befallen it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0016
rows.name:
Don't misunderstandâ€”I love it here, and so does Rock.
This fair city and world are a second home to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0017
rows.name:
But one day I would like to leave it and visit my
original home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0018
rows.name: Could that be because you lost your memory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0019
rows.name:
Or is it because you think that you might discover
something painful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0020
rows.name:
Poor Rock doesn't have a homeworld.
And frankly, I'm not even sure if mine still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well, I think we share the same feelings.
Let us leave it at that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0022
rows.name:
I quite like this fair city. Perhaps we should just stay
here forever with all of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0023
rows.name:
After all, this is now the home that I yearn to protect
with all my heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001395_MSG0024
rows.name: There's nothing wrong with that, right?[ST:wait ]
